Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, we believe it's worth more than $10,000 to you. Considering its true value, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to purchase it for $13,500. This price represents an excellent balance between the product's worth and your perceived value, allowing us both to benefit. I trust that you'll find this proposal fair and inviting. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $13,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $13,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
